views.markdown: Customizes YouTube video slider and scrubber color. You can also replace the scrubber with your own image.
- Fixed setting slider color not working in Subscription and You tabs on some YouTube version 19.x
- Fixed setting scrubber color not working on YouTube version 20.22.1

- Added a new setting to animate slider and scrubber progress
- Fixed slider color not being applied on some old YouTube versions
- Added th localization
- Fixed setting slider color not working in Subscription and You tabs
- Fixed app crash on older 19.x YouTube versions

- Fixed scrubber sizing logic in regular videos
- Fixed scrubber styling when the scrubber size is non-default
- Added 55% - 200% scrubber size options
- Applied slider and scrubber customization to auto-playing videos in the home page
